description:
Protein-DNA Interaction Workflow (PDI Workflow), a pipeline that focuses on generating
high-quality docking and molecular dynamics simulations for Protein-DNA complexes. This allows us to take DNA
sequences with unknown tertiary structures, accurately predict their structure, dock them with the desired target protein,
and then simulate their interactions using molecular dynamics simulations
name: Auto_PDI

permissions.exemptionText: This source code is restricted by patent and / or intellectual property law.
